description:
You arrive at a western style mansion where you will be living as the manager and you meet the cool college student named Ashihara Takumi. You also encounter Nishina Aoi, who is a high school student who loves acting, and Miyasaka Shinya, an elite salaryman. Your exciting life living under one roof with them is about to start.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ルームメイトは歓迎する
